title.narrative: Peace and Stabilisation Programme Horn of Africa 2018-2022

description.narrative: Denmark's Peace and Stabilisation Programme for the Horn of Africa 2018-2022 covers Ethiopia, Kenya and Somalia with a special focus on the ongoing conflict in Somalia, recognizing its regional consequences.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

description.narrative: FL §06.32.08.80 Global Framework for Integrated Stabilisation Efforts (development assistance)

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Output 1.2: ICEPCVE to enable target groups to implement initiatives aligned with the IGAD Regional P/CVE Strategy. The ICEPCVE provides trusted platforms and resources for the direct target groups to engage with one another and for them to have their recommendations validated with policymakers.
The ICEPCVE convenes bi-annual workshops on P/CVE collaboration between state and non-state actors.

target.value: The ICEPCVE has convened 1 bi-annual workshop on P/CVE collaboration between state and non-state actors.

actual.value: 0 workshops held. However, a meeting for CSOs was held to 1) discuss how to strengthen the regional CSO network in the region, and 2) equip CSO leader with communication skills to produce alternative and counter narratives against violent extremism.

target.value: The ICEPCVE has convened 2 bi-annual workshops on P/CVE collaboration between state and non-state actors.

actual.value: 0 workshops held. The center started planning a strategic communication workshop targeting youth.

target.value: The ICEPCVE has convened 2 bi-annual workshops on P/CVE collaboration between state and non-state actors.
The ICEPCVE has convened 3 bi-annual workshops on P/CVE collaboration between state and non-state actors.

title.narrative: Output 2.2: ICEPCVE to enable target groups to effectively apply best practices, including gender and conflict-sensitive tools and methodologies, in their preventative work and strategies.
The ICEPCVE convene 6 learning visits for state representatives with 15 participants per learning visit.

target.value: The ICEPCVE has convened 2 learning visits for state representatives with 15 participants per learning visit (total of 30) of which at least 50 percent are female.

actual.value: No learning visits conducted. The Centre made a presentation on “Regional approach to PCVE strategic communications, lessons learnt and recommendations” during a training that brought together representatives from NCTC Tanzania, Kenya and Uganda. The objective of the training was to support the Government of Uganda and Tanzania in building their knowledge of strategic communications and its use in PCVE approaches.

target.value: The ICEPCVE has convened 1 learning visit for state representatives with 15 participants of which at least 50 percent are female.

actual.value: No learning visits for state representatives reported.

target.value: The ICEPCVE has convened 2 learning visits for state representatives with 15 participants per learning visit (total of 30) of which at least 50 percent are female.

actual.value: No learning visits for state representatives reported.

target.value: The ICEPCVE has convened 6 cross learning visit for state representatives with 21 participants of which at least 40 percent are female.

actual.value: One experience sharing meeting has been held with 42 state actors participating.

title.narrative: Output 1.1: ICEPCVE to enable target groups to implement initiatives aligned with the IGAD Regional P/CVE Strategy. The CSO Hub and the regional researcher’s network will coordinate implementation of initiatives by non-state actors.
The CSO Network, the Youth Network, and the Women’s Organisation Network are active and increase their number of enrolled members with 158 in total per year.

target.value: The CSO Network (53), the Youth Network (53), and the Women’s Organisation (53) have 159 enrolled members in total.

actual.value: 18 new members in CSO networks, 16 new members in youth networks, 10 new members in women networks (44 new members in total) from 5 different organisations per country. The center has focused on increasing network membership for youth and CSOs from all countries - mainly through virtual platforms.The center launched a virtual platform where non-state actors can communicate and share experiences, the center hosted a regional media roundtable discussion on establishing a regional media network, the center mapped youth organisations in Sudan and South Sudan, the the center mapped 30 women-led organisations dealing with P/CVE and added them to the digitial hub.

target.value: The CSO Network (53), the Youth Network (53), and the Women’s Organisation (53) have 159 enrolled members in total.

actual.value: 26 new members in CSO networks, 0 new members in youth networks, 21 new members in women networks (47 new members in total).

target.value: The CSO Network (53), the Youth Network (53), and the Women’s Organisation (53) have 159 enrolled members in total.

actual.value: 85 new members in CSO networks, 58 new members in youth networks, 61 new members in women networks (204 new members in total). Focus on strengthening CSO Hub and expanding youth and women organization network. Workshop with 18 YALI Alumnae to equip young leaders with new and innovative campaigns to challenge extremism and promote peace.

target.value: The CSO Network (53), the Youth Network (53), and the Women’s Organisation (53) have 159 enrolled members in total.

actual.value: Youth and CSO networks established in Djibouti, Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Tanzania and Uganda. 10 new members in CSO networks, 12 new members in youth networks and 7 new members in women organisations (29 new members in total).
